{{Infobox company |company_name = LatentView Analytics Corporation |company_logo = [[File:LatentView Analytics Logo 2010.JPG|180px|LatentView Analytics Logo]] |company_type = [[Private company|Private]] |foundation = 2006 |founder = [[Venkat Viswanathan]], Pramad Jandhyala, Ramesh Hariharan |locations = {{ubl|[[New Jersey]], {{nowrap|United States}}||[[San Jose, California|San Jose]], United States[[Chennai]], India|[[Mumbai]], India|[[Singapore]], Singapore}} |area_served = Worldwide |industry = {{ubl|[[Analytics]]|[[Data Analysis]]|[[Predictive analytics]]|[[Machine Learning]]|[[Big Data]]}} |homepage = [http://www.latentview.com www.latentview.com] |intl = yes }}
'''LatentView Analytics Corporation''' is a [[predictive analytics]] and [[enterprise decision management]] services firm headquartered in [[Princeton, New Jersey]] that provides decision science and analytics services. The firm uses a combination of [[analytics]], [[technology]], [[machine learning]] science, [[Big data|large-scale data management]] and human expertise to build and deliver analytics [[solution]]s to large and mid-size clients in a number of sectors, including [[financial services]], [[consumer goods]] and [[retail]].<ref>{{cite web | url=http://latentview.com/solutions-industry.htm | title=What We Do - Industry Solutions | publisher=LatentView Analytics | work=LatentView | accessdate=5 April 2012}}</ref>
==Company== Founded in 2006 by [[Venkat Viswanathan]], Pramad Jandhyala<ref>{{cite web | url=http://www.bitsaa.org/?page=bitsianentrepreneurs | title=List of BITSian Entrepreneurs | publisher=BITSAA International | work=BITSAA Entrepreneurs | accessdate=5 April 2012}}</ref> and Ramesh Hariharan, LatentView has sales offices in Princeton, New Jersey and [[Mumbai]], India and its global delivery centre in [[Chennai]]. The delivery centre in Chennai supports the companyâ€™s analytic and technology activities, developing models and applications for use by clients.
==Recognitions== In 2009 and 2010, LatentView was identified as one of the fastest growing technology companies in India by the Deloitte Technology Fast 50.<ref>{{cite web | url=http://www.deloitte.com/assets/Dcom-India/Local%20Assets/Documents/Winners_report_Technology_Fast_50_2009.pdf | title=Winners Report Technology Fast 50 2009 | publisher=Deloitte Touche Tohmatsu India | date=November 2009 | accessdate=5 April 2012 | format=PDF}}</ref><ref>{{cite web | url=http://www.deloitte.com/assets/Dcom-India/Local%20Assets/Documents/Winners_report_Technology_Fast_50_2010.pdf | title=Technology Fast50 India 2010 | publisher=Deloitte Touche Tohmatsu India | date=November 2010 | accessdate=5 April 2012 | format=PDF}}</ref>
In 2008, LatentView was adjudged as one of the winners at the [[INFORMS]] [[Data Mining]] Contest. The contest was organized by [[INFORMS|The Institute for Operations Research and the Management Sciences]]. <ref>{{cite web | url=http://www.kdnuggets.com/news/2008/n19/20i.html | title=LatentView among the winners at INFORMS 2008 Data Mining Contest | publisher=KDnuggets | date=26 September 2008 | accessdate=5 April 2012}}</ref>
In April 2010, LatentView was adjudged the runner up<ref>{{cite web | url=http://sede.neurotech.com.br/PAKDD2010/result.do?method=load | title=PAKDD 2010 Data Mining Conference | publisher=Neurotech | work=sede.neurotech.com | accessdate=5 April 2012}}</ref> in the [http://pakdd.org/ PAKDD] 2010 [[Data Mining]] Competition at the Pacific-Asia Conference on Knowledge Discovery and Data Mining Conference 2010 held in [[Hyderabad, India]]. In the same competition in April 2009, LatentView finished amongst the top 10<ref>{{cite web | url=http://sede.neurotech.com.br:443/PAKDD2009/result.do?method=load | title=PAKDD 2009 Data Mining Conference| | publisher=Neurotech | work=sede.neurotech.com | accessdate=5 April 2012}}</ref> teams at the Pacific-Asia Conference on Knowledge Discovery and Data Mining Conference 2009 organized in Thailand.
